description: This table contains the authorization information for each hospital transaction.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUTH_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This item is the list of coverages the associated Authorization values are being applied to.

columns.name: AUTH_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the list of authorization number overrides for a charge. This item cannot be set at the same time as Authorization ID (I HTR 833).

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: This item is the list of authorization records linked to a charge

columns.name: AUTH_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores the source of the authorization link.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


System


Charge Router Handler

columns.name: AUTH_OVRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who was responsible for the last authorization assignment.

columns.name: AUTH_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the last time the authorization was updated either by the system or a user.

columns.name: INCL_IN_AUTH_CHG_CNT_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the charge contributes to the used count of the authorization linked to it.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
